meanings.definition: A form of vitamin B3 that is used in skincare products for its anti-inflammatory and brightening properties.
meanings.sent1: I apply niacinamide on my face to reduce redness and improve my skin tone.
meanings.sent2: The niacinamide in this cream helps to soothe irritation and even out skin pigmentation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the skincare product go to therapy? Because it had too much niacinamide and needed to lighten up!
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed like niacinamide under the bright sun, radiating health and vitality.
meanings.sent5: As I looked in the mirror, I could see the niacinamide working its magic, making my skin look more radiant.
